citation: Proclamation under the Weed Management Act 1999 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Weed Management Act 1999

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Weed Management Act 1999 fix 1 September 2000 as the day on which that Act commences.

7 August 2000

W. J. E. COX

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

PAULA WRIEDT

For and on behalf of the Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 August 2000

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
